GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.88 to before v5.10.159
GSD.description:
xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit 83632fc41449c480f2d0193683ec202caaa186c9, it was introduced in version v5.10.88 by commit 88f20cccbeec9a5e83621df5cc2453b5081454dc. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: don't call kfree_skb() with interrupts disabled
